DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to how often a patient uses his/her hearing aid device or hearing aid devices.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Devices that are used to enhance hearing._To put into action or service._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: To put into action or service._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A natural number greater than 7 and less than 9 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of seven and one.: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A natural number greater than 7 and less than 9 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of seven and one.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.

It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.

ReferenceDocuments.description: If your child is currently fit with a hearing device, how often does she/he wear it on a typical day?
